title: Trello Time Report
description: Generate insightful time reports from your Trello boards.

hero.description: The perfect extension for teams needing to monitor time spent on tasks and generate detailed reports directly from Trello.
hero.imageAlt: Team working with Trello Time Report

features.title: Powerful Features
features.description: Everything you need to track time and generate reports for your Trello boards.

card1.title: Detailed Reports
card1.description: Generate comprehensive reports by board, list, team member, or time period. Export data in multiple formats.

card2.title: Team Analytics
card2.description: Visualize your team's productivity and identify bottlenecks with interactive dashboards.

card3.title: Time Tracking
card3.description: Easily log time spent on tasks directly from Trello cards. Automatic summation and analysis.

card4.title: Data Visualization
card4.description: Transform time data into clear charts and diagrams that aid decision-making.

card5.title: Project Billing
card5.description: Automatically generate billing reports based on logged work time.

card6.title: Trello Integration
card6.description: Seamless integration with Trello without disrupting your existing workflow.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that best suits your team's needs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about Trello Time Report.

item1.question: How to start using Trello Time Report?
item1.answer: To start, sign up for free, connect your Trello account, and select the boards you want to monitor. Our intuitive interface will guide you through the setup process in minutes.

item2.question: Can I export data to other formats?
item2.answer: Yes, Trello Time Report allows data export to CSV, PDF, and Excel formats. You can also integrate our API with other data analysis tools.

item3.question: Does the app work on mobile devices?
item3.answer: Yes, our application is fully responsive and works on all mobile devices. You can track time and view reports from anywhere.

item4.question: Can I track time for multiple Trello boards?
item4.answer: Absolutely! You can track time for an unlimited number of Trello boards. Our tool allows easy switching between boards and generating aggregate reports.

item5.question: How does billing work and what are the pricing plans?
item5.answer: We offer a free starter plan and premium plans with additional features. Billing is monthly or annually, with a discount for annual payment. Detailed information can be found in the Pricing section.

footer.description: Generate insightful time reports from your Trello boards.
